alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 04 at 10:19PM AKST until December 05 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow, freezing rain and blowing snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting to 40 mph. Visibiltiy one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Brief period or low visibility in snow and blowing snow is possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys
